divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting in bed looking out the window and bam there was a huge light. then 2 ufos rose up and was heading out of the atmisphere going at least 900 mph.it was scarey.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Star-like
Summary: it was a huge flash of light then rose 2 huge ufos
